channel.title: Renesas synced on SyncE Projects

item.title: Documentation
item.description: Table of Contents Hardware Software Configuration Management API Event Callback Functions Acronyms Hardware Figure 1. Hardware inter-connection between SyncE ports, external clocks, inputs, outputs, the DPLL device, and the CPU running synced application. One or more external multiplexers can be used to connect multiple SyncE ports to a clock. The multiplexers can be both single-output or dual-output: Those ports connected to external multiplexers, which are not associated to a clock, are called SyncE monitoring ports.
